name: Edenred
description: Edenred is a leading digital platform for services and payments and the everyday companion for people at work, connecting 60 million users and 2 million partner merchants in 45 countries via close to 1 million corporate clients.
features: Edenred offers specific-purpose payment solutions for food (such as meal benefits)
incentives (such as gift cards, employee engagement platforms)
mobility (such as multi-energy, maintenance, toll, parking and commuter solutions) and corporate payments (such as virtual cards)
Headline: Edenred offers specific-purpose payment solutions for food (such as meal benefits), incentives (such as gift cards, employee engagement platforms), mobility (such as multi-energy, maintenance, toll, parking and commuter solutions) and corporate payments (such as virtual cards).
ShortDescription: Edenred India, the leader in work-life benefits, rewards and loyalty solutions.
enhanced_description: Edenred is a leading digital platform for services and payments and the everyday companion for people at work, connecting 60 million users and 2 million partner merchants in 45 countries via close to 1 million corporate clients. It specializes in work-life benefits, rewards, and loyalty solutions, offering specific-purpose payment solutions for food (such as meal benefits), incentives (such as gift cards, employee engagement platforms), mobility (such as multi-energy, maintenance, toll, parking and commuter solutions), and corporate payments (such as virtual cards).
key_use_cases: Administering employee incentive programs and gift cards
Offering mobility solutions for employees (e.g., fuel, maintenance, tolls, parking, commuting)
Facilitating corporate payments via virtual cards
Delivering work-life benefits and loyalty solutions
competitive_advantages: Leading digital platform for services and payments
Extensive global reach, operating in 45 countries
Large user base (60 million users) and corporate client base (1 million corporate clients)
Broad network of partner merchants (2 million)
Offers specific-purpose payment solutions tailored for various needs (food, incentives, mobility, corporate payments)
primary_users: Corporate clients (HR and management purchasing/administering solutions)
scalability_features: Platform connects 60 million users, 2 million partner merchants, and nearly 1 million corporate clients across 45 countries, indicating high scalability.
